FILE NAME:     RSRET01
DATE MODIFIED: October 2, 2018
USED BY:       RDRET subroutine of the National Energy Modeling System (NEMS) Residential Demand Module (RDM)
DEFINITION:    Retirement fractions for each of the residential equipment classes in the base year
UNITS:         Dimensionless; share of existing equipment that has been retired up to a given projection year
DIMENSION:     year, equipment class (same as RSCLASS tab of RSMESS.xlsx)
SPECIAL CONSTRAINTS:  non-negative values not exceeding 1.0000 (100% of RECS-year equipment retired)
ORGANIZATION OF DATA:
               Data starts on row 21 of this file as per RDM convention.
SOURCES:       Unknown
COMMENT:       Year range updated for 2015 RECS
